game: "Queen's Four" (players 2) (equipment { (board (rectangle 12 15)) (piece "Ball" Each (move Slide)) }) (rules (start { (place "Ball1" (sites {7 22 67 82 127 142})) (place "Ball2" (sites {37 52 97 112 157 172})) }) (play (forEach Piece)) (end (if (is Line 4) (result Mover Win))) )
metadata: (info { (description "Sliding queens to make a 4 in-a-row.") (rules "On each turn, each player must move one friendly stone. Stones slide (orthogonally or diagonally) over a line of empty cells (like a non-capturing chess queen). Wins the player that makes a 4 in-a-row.") (id "4293") (source "<a href=\"https: (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/space/line") (author "Christopher Clark") (credit "Eric Piette") } ) (graphics { (board Style Board) (board Colour InnerEdges (colour 160 140 100)) (board Colour OuterEdges (colour Hidden)) (board Colour Phase0 (colour 255 230 150)) (show Edges Diagonal Hidden) (player Colour P1 (colour Blue)) (player Colour P2 (colour Red)) })
